pkgmetadata.longdescription: Analysing Non-Verbal Communication in Dyadic Interactions from Video Data // Analyzes non-verbal communication by processing data extracted from video recordings of dyadic interactions. It supports integration with open source tools, currently limited to 'OpenPose' (Cao et al. (2019) doi:10.1109/TPAMI.2019.2929257), converting its outputs into CSV format for further analysis. The package includes functions for data pre-processing, visualization, and computation of motion indices such as velocity, acceleration, and jerkiness (Cook et al. (2013) doi:10.1093/brain/awt208), facilitating the analysis of non-verbal cues in paired interactions and contributing to research on human communication dynamics.
